name: にちか
text:
…………すみません、なんか
……うるさくてー……

name: プロデューサー
text:
……えっ
す、すまん……俺、またなんか邪魔しちゃってたな
trans:
...Huh.
S-Sorry... It seems I'm disturbing you.

name: にちか
trans:
...Guh.
No, it's not you... It's like...

name: にちか
text:
しません？
すっごい静かな時に、キーン、みたいな音
trans:
Does that ever happen to you?
That ringing noise, that gets stuck in your ears
when everything is too silent.

name: にちか
text:
────なんなんですかねー、これ
めっっっちゃ、集中してるのに………………
trans:
───Why does it happen, anyway?
I'd been sooo focused before it started...

name: プロデューサー
text:
……ありがとな
台本だけでも、いくつもあるもんな
trans:
...I bet. Thanks for working so hard.
You've got a lot of scripts to review.

name: プロデューサー
text:
少し疲れてるのかもしれない
……30分くらいなら、仮眠とれるよ
trans:
That sound might be because you're feeling tired.
...You could try to nap for the next thirty minutes.

name: にちか
text:
……っ
30分寝たらもう出る時間ですけど予習抜きで行きますー？
trans:
...Guh. If I nap for the next thirty minutes, then it'll
already be time to leave! Do you want me to just
wing it at my next gig?

name: プロデューサー
text:
いや……現場の前に打ち合わせひとつ入ってるだろ？
それ、俺だけで行ってくるよ
trans:
I mean... Before it starts I think we'll be able to
squeeze a meeting in, right? And I'm the only one
going with you.

name: プロデューサー
text:
だから、早めに控室入って……
そこで予習にしないか？
trans:
So, we can head back to the green room a little
early... And then do any preparation needed there,
how about it?
